pullrequest.title: Use python3 instead of python (except Trusty) in dependencies archive

content.raw:
this has broken gazebo_ros_pkgs builds with the error from https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/catkin_pkg/issues/125

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any_melodic-bionic-amd64/83/console

~~~
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 python3-catkin-tools : Depends: python3-trollius but it is not installable
 python3-rosdep : Depends: python3-rosdistro but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: python3-rosdep-modules (>= 0.18.0) but it is not going to be installed
 python3-rosinstall : Depends: python3-rosdistro (>= 0.3.0) but it is not going to be installed
 ros-melodic-camera-info-manager : Depends: ros-melodic-roslib but it is not going to be installed
 ros-melodic-catkin : Depends: python-catkin-pkg (> 0.4.3) but it is not going to be installed
...
~~~

this has broken gazebo_ros_pkgs builds with the error from https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/catkin_pkg/issues/125

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any_melodic-bionic-amd64/83/console

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 python3-catkin-tools : Depends: python3-trollius but it is not installable
 python3-rosdep : Depends: python3-rosdistro but it is not going to be installed
                  Depends: python3-rosdep-modules (>= 0.18.0) but it is not going to be installed
 python3-rosinstall : Depends: python3-rosdistro (>= 0.3.0) but it is not going to be installed
 ros-melodic-camera-info-manager : Depends: ros-melodic-roslib but it is not going to be installed
 ros-melodic-catkin : Depends: python-catkin-pkg (> 0.4.3) but it is not going to be installed
...
